mapper.select: select act.id,u.username as owner,act.name,act.startDate,act.endDate,act.type,act.state, act.budgetcost,act.actualcost,act.description,act.createTime,act.editBy,act.createBy, act.editTime from w_activity act inner join w_user u on act.owner=u.id where act.id=#{aid}
mapper.update: update w_activity set name=#{name}, startDate=#{startDate}, endDate=#{endDate}, description=#{description}, budgetcost=#{budgetcost}, actualcost=#{actualcost}, editBy=#{editBy} where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into w_activity( owner, name, startDate, endDate, type, state, budgetcost, actualcost, description, createTime, createBy ) values( #{owner}, #{name}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{type}, #{state}, #{budgetcost}, #{actualcost}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{createBy} )
